item.title: Set up a Ghost blog
item.author: nikhilweee@gmail.com (Nikhil Verma)
item.description: Before you read This is not an in-depth tutorial for a total newbie. Something like that would make this a really long post. Though I’ve given one-liners explaining each command, It would be better if you had some experience working with the linux terminal and a basic understanding of how web content is served. Things you’ll need Just the two of them will do A Server : This is where your site contents will be stored.
